price: 48. У Ўз раҳматининг (яъни, ёмғирнинг) олдидан хушхабар қилиб шамолларни юборган Зотдир. Ва осмондан пок сув ёғдирдик.
arabic: وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِيٓ أَرۡسَلَ ٱلرِّيَٰحَ بُشۡرَۢا بَيۡنَ يَدَيۡ رَحۡمَتِهِۦۚ وَأَنزَلۡنَا مِنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ مَآءٗ طَهُورٗا

version.title: Uzbek translation - Alauddin Mansour
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Uzbek by Alauddin Mansour, printed in 1430 H. Notice: Some referred translated verses corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wahuwa alladhī arsala al-riyāḥa bush'ran bayna yaday raḥmatihi wa-anzalnā mina al-samāi māan ṭahūran
